name: Shopping Mall for Rich Girls
description:
Shopping mall for rich girls is a free trending game for girls makeup , makeover, dress Up, salon and shopping. This crazy fashion shopping adventure game will help you to choose best of your outfit and clothes to look like a gorgeous rich girl with branded accessories. Get ready to compete in your favorite beauty contest. Every girl dreamed for the best of her shopping. At this weekend, college and job girls are curious to rush to the malls for shopping. Girls need to have some fun while shopping so that’s why they take their best friends with them for real shopping style.

There are many levels in this game to enjoy the real taste of crazy shopping.

DRESS MAKING …!!!

Let’s move to the tailor boutique shop to select the colors and clothes styling with your own desires. In this girls tailor shop, you can have the outfits, jewelry, shoes and other makeover accessories with your own styles.

MAKEUP …!!!

Let’s refresh your skin and enjoy the makeup in a famous beauty salon with blush on, mascara, eye liner, eye lashes, lipsticks, hairstyling and eye coloring.You need to looks different and more charming in the contest.

SHOPPING MALL …!!!

It’s time for some crazy shopping with your friends and family in this newly opened crazy shopping mall where up to 60% is off on all products.You do not miss the chance.Check your wardrobes and let out your old fashioned outfits.

HAIR STYLING …!!!

Let’s move to the hairstyling hairdresser barber shop for some crazy hairstyling ideas for your contest. There is hair gel, shampoo, comb, scissor, hair shiner, dryer and straightener to make your hairs more gorgeous and stylish.

CAKE DECORATION …!!!

Now these girls are little tired and feeling hungry. So you can make a delicious cake and then decorate it with many top ons. After this girls need to get discover the many clothing stores. Come on girls, its to be a crazy fun.

JEWELRY NECKLACE SHOP …!!!

Girls usually like to wear more precious and beautiful jewelry.Girls wishes to have well designed tiaras, bracelet, diamonds, gold crowns, silver ear rings, necklaces and rings for different events like wedding, party, contest and college or school first day.

BEAUTY CONTEST ….!!!

Be confident and let’s behave like a fashion star in this beauty contest because you are going to represent yourself on this beauty contest stage in front of crowd. Talk and walk like a model and emerging designer. Show off your skills to impress the judges.


You can show your fashion designers skills to your friends and family by making these girls more gorgeous with lot of outfits. It can be the best educational game. You can wait for our upcoming cooking, dress up, makeup and makeover games. Remember, It is the FREE Game to have some real Fun.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
